name: postgresql-sharding-demo
description: PostgreSQL Sharding with Citus - from regular table to distributed and back

scripts.phase1: npm run setup && npm run demo
scripts.phase2: node reshard.js enable-citus && npm run demo
scripts.phase3: node reshard.js add-worker && node reshard.js rebalance && npm run demo
scripts.phase4: node reshard.js undistribute && npm run demo
scripts.all: npm run phase1 && npm run phase2 && npm run phase3 && npm run phase4
